originalName: [SDS VN] Fast Business_Check Payslip on App-1770710745374-652697335.pdf
content:
VIEW YOUR PAYSLIP ON FAST BUSINESS ONLINE APP
Payslips are only available on the mobile app for security
reasons. The app limits access to one registered device.
Please follow these simple steps:
Log in the FAST Business Online app on your phone.
Tap “Report” (1) at the bottom menu.
Select “Payslip” (2) from the list.
In the form: (3)
Period: enter the month number (e.g. 7 for July).
Year: enter the year (e.g. 2025).
Then tap “Ok” (4) to view your payslip.
 Note: 
Payslips are not accessible on the web to protect your
personal salary information. 
If you change your device, please inform HR to register
the new one.
